item.title: It's time for a Union General Meeting
item.author: Scott F A Heath,
item.description: It took me approximately 4 months to really understand how the University and Union work. Both of these organisations are layered with bureaucracy, which doesn’t help. Additionally, you need to get to term time before various committees meet and the workloads hit a stage where acronyms like SRASOC* …

item.title: Don’t be afraid to ask for help
item.author: Scott F A Heath,
item.description: Everybody has a coping mechanism; a way to ensure their heads don’t explode from stress, annoyance or the general tedium of life. My own takes the form of cooking; every revision period you can guarantee a minimum of 5 three-course meals and a couple of home recipe cakes. The result of this …
